article_node.title: Sophie Turner recalls accidentally ending celebrity couple's engagement at San Diego Comic-Con party
article_node.summary: Sophie Turner recalled an awkward encounter at a 2014 San Diego Comic‑Con party that may have caused a celebrity couple to call off their engagement. While waving to an actor she didn’t know, a famous actress later confronted her, accusing her of flirting with her fiancé. Turner joked that her simple wave might have had unintended consequences, and the incident was discussed on Seth Meyers’ Late Night.
